title: "First stars in the universe formed in groups, machine-learning study reveals"
excerpt: "Machine learning has been used to characterize the heavy elements that the first stars in the universe passed on to their immediate successors after they exploded in supernovae. This cosmic inheritance of elements was studied by researchers affiliated with the Kavli Institute for the Physics and Mathematics of the Universe in Tokyo,"
